summary: REQ-24 appears fully implemented: a default-on maintenance mode switch gates App rendering to a single centered unavailable screen, preventing all marketing sections from rendering, without touching the listed immutable frontend paths (based on provided diff summary).

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/modified repository metadata/state summary files not requested by the BuildRequest (frontend-file-summaries.txt and project_state.json).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked for maintenance mode behavior and constraints; it did not request changes to summary/state tracking files.
